title: The Amazing Mr. X (remastered edition) (1948, film-noir, imdb score: 6.4)

sources.title: The Amazing Mr. X (remastered edition) (1948, film-noir, imdb score: 6.4)
sources.description: The Amazing Mr. X , also known as The Spiritualist , is a 1948 American horror thriller film noir directed by Bernard Vorhaus with cinematography by John Alton. The film tells the story of a phony spiritualist racket. The film is prominently featured in Alton's book on cinematography Painting with Light (1949). The film stars Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari, Cathy O'Donnell, and Richard Carlson. Eagle-Lion Films signed a contract with Carole Landis for the part played by Bari, but Landis committed suicide a few days before filming began.
